tool_description:
UK Postal Code(ex. ZE1 0AE), Sector,  District,  Boundaries API:

A simple & very fast API that will allow you to integrate multiple GeoJson UK Unit and sector level boundaries result into your apps and systems.
This API is designed to be used programatically for optimal performance.  When using the MashApe UI for queries expect significant latency issues on large result sets!
name: uk.boundaries.io
title: uk.boundaries.io

api_list.name: Query for Hexagon by Location and Resolution
api_list.description: Query for Hexagon by Location and Resolution

api_list.name: Query for Hexagon by H3Index
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vanitysoft-uk-boundaries-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com/rest/v1/public/boundary/h3/index/635177333670728575"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vanitysoft-uk-boundaries-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vanitysoft-uk-boundaries-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com/rest/v1/public/boundary/h3/index/{h3index}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vanitysoft-uk-boundaries-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Retrieve UK Postal Sector Outline Boundaries
Retrieve UK Postal District Outline Boundaries
Query for Postal Code Unit Boundary( H3 Geo Boundary )
api_list.description:
Query for Postal Unit Boundary (ex. ZE1 0AE) 

https://eng.uber.com/

required_parameters.name: postal-unit
required_parameters.description: Query by postal units. for example 'ZE1 0AE", or multiples.

api_list.name: Query for Postal Unit Boundary by H3Index
api_list.description:
Query for Postal Unit Boundary by H3Index

If  a Postal Unit code exists within this hexagon a boundary is returned.
adjusting the resolution(0-16) increases the hexagon area.

https://eng.uber.com/

api_list.name: Query for Distance between two H3 Indexes
api_list.description: Query for Distance between two H3 Indexes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vanitysoft-uk-boundaries-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com/rest/v1/public/boundary/h3/index1/8d2baad9c6f073f/index2/8d09a6b6ed2d37f/hex"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vanitysoft-uk-boundaries-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vanitysoft-uk-boundaries-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com/rest/v1/public/boundary/h3/index1/{h3index1}/index2/{h3index2}/hex"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vanitysoft-uk-boundaries-io-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
